Just completed the almost nightly ritual of reporting the rank stench of landfill gas from #WalleysQuarry to @EnvAgencyMids & @NewsNBC. 
Getting fed up with this üí© now, #EA are clearly not fit for purpose. #StopTheStink #CapitOff, & sack that useless  woman who's in charge! üò†

tweets.text: How can we believe that the @EnvAgency can be trusted when they allow the hydrogen sulphide levels to exceed WHO safety levels? And how can we trust @PHE_EoEngland when they fail to speak for us? @MattHancock have you got a plan yet? @StinkStopthe #stopthestink @BorisJohnson https://t.co/pLZCE48pQ5

@Cap_it_off @RedIndustries2 @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA is ignoring such a blatant breach of H2S emissions, according to WHO, total incompetence on your part or are you hiding something? Your platitudes and insincere words don't cut it with us it's action and action now we want #StopTheStink

tweets.text: @HelenVi00175623 @SianieRoo @PHE_EoEngland @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA @BBCPanorama @StinkStopthe @PHE_uk @AnnaTurns @JeremyVineOn5 Bus driver here. The amount of times it‚Äôs woken me up in the night is unreal.

We won last weekend. Who has the stench of HYDROGEN SULPHIDE this weekend? POSTCODE LOTTO The winners take all one UNLUCKY LARGE  WIDESPREAD  area will win the Following; coughing, retching, burning nostrils, burning throat, headache, streaming eyes, streaming nose #StopTheStink

tweets.text: Have always supported local businesses but finding when I get the chance I just want to get as far away from this town as possible. Desperate for fresh air and stress free days away from the poisonous fumes @MattHancock @EnvAgency @PHE_EoEngland @StinkStopthe #stopthesti https://t.co/xgz9fsDH94

Goodnight Newcastle, sending hope out into the STink postcodes for a decent night knowing many will not have one. I am so sad and outraged @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @DefraGovUK @JamesBevanEA @ClareDinnisEA @PHE_uk @PHE_WestMids #BetterTogether #C4News ü™î

Don‚Äôt forget to register now for our free #preventingplasticpollution virtual workshop for businesses to be held at 10-12 on Monday 19 April co-hosted by @EnvAgency & @GreentechSouth as part of our @Plastic_EU project. @BITCenvironment @hantschamber @solentlep https://t.co/gJqnHzRe4a

@DrMickSalt @EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA Is the situation under control yet? Is your failure to regulate @RedIndustries2 negligent? Is the cost to health @PHE_uk just collateral damage? Should @JamesBevanEA #sackclaredinnis or should they both resign  #crimesagainsthumanity #stopthestink
@annjsmall @StinkStopthe @Tus_M_ @AaronBell4NUL @PHE_WestMids Just made another complaint

Enough is enough the @EnvAgencyMids have failed us @ClareDinnisEA you should be held personally responsible, you are allowing all of us and our children to be poisoned you need to go. #sackclaredinnis

@RedIndustries2  I got your new company logo, Anyway the wind blows, doesn‚Äôt really matter to me. Clear it doesn‚Äôt, you are poisoning communities 7 miles away, Women, children, men, household pets and local livestock and wildlife.  How does that feel? Good? https://t.co/40MwppNdOC

Rather curiously there hasn't been a single Tweet from the @EnvAgency in the last 24 hours bragging about how they 'Enhance", the environment.

https://t.co/WaaFQXr1lZ

We can‚Äôt breathe upstairs. We received a letter today from the @EnvAgency after suffering since we moved here in 2016 - it feels like a kick in the teeth that it‚Äôs taken this long for the EA to do anything. In the pocket of Red #StopTheStink @StinkStopthe @AaronBell4NUL @PHE_uk
@SianieRoo @TerriDeakin1 @HelenVi00175623 The only person who could help is the person with power to shut the quarry down for good give us our fresh air back
@SianieRoo @TerriDeakin1 @HelenVi00175623 The stench is so strong in our house nothing deteroius it we tried everything we possibly can but no joy at all there must be something we not tried yet

@RedIndustries2 @AaronBell4NUL @StinkStopthe another morning, another thick, putrid, nauseating stench filling the air. I‚Äôm not sure what smells worse, the stench of sulphur or the stench of #redindustries shamelessness. #StopTheStink

Just a normal day in @NewsNBC woke up feel like death,headache,nausea,bad throat,eyes sore in bright light maybe I‚Äôm a vampire üßõ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è or is it something to do with the @EnvAgencyMids failing to regulate the stench from @RedIndustries2 Walleys Landfill ü§î @StinkStopthe #stopthestink https://t.co/EhMxztpkVs

I honestly cannot remember the last time I wasn‚Äôt woke up by the #walleysquarry gases or waking up to find it all in the house. This is getting SO out of hand it is scary. We can‚Äôt live like this. It is torture. #stopthestink @AaronBell4NUL @EnvAgencyMids @PHE_WestMids https://t.co/mMwXKzP3FY

I am astonished now that we have to even ask for clean air let alone scream and shout and demand it. The @EnvAgency @PHE_EoEngland & government @MattHancock @BorisJohnson are currently standing aside and watching our kids get gassed in their beds. @StinkStopthe #stopthesti https://t.co/hlo4bBBGnQ

#sackclaredinnis #sackclaredinnis #sackclaredinnis #sackclaredinnis #sackclaredinnis #sackclaredinnis #sackclaredinnis #sackclaredinnis #sackclaredinnis #sackclaredinnis #sackclaredinnis #sackclaredinnis @l1ttleherbert @stopthestink @AaronBell4NUL

Read our latest update for #WalleysQuarry landfill site here üëâhttps://t.co/o558iAVicn

We're visiting the surrounding area on an almost daily basis to carry out odour amenity checks. We're also continuing to inspect the site, including monitoring the progress of the capping. https://t.co/FsLQlvsU0f

tweets.text:
Let‚Äôs talk hydrogen sulphide. 

An average landfill at maximum emits around an average of 3-5ugm3 at its peak.  

Walleys quarry emitted 202ugm3.  A mere 40 times higher.  

 @EnvAgencyMids @DefraGovUK @BorisJohnson @CHEMTrust @MattHancock 
#StopTheStink https://t.co/7wFYZmphcm

tweets.text:
At Health Questions I asked @MattHancock about the public health implications of the breaches at Walley's Quarry.

I know, from both the local GPs and those writing to me, that many residents are concerned for their health, both physically and mentally. @PHE_uk @EnvAgencyMids https://t.co/pwh6zUI4Zs

Can't believe what I'm seeing. Thousands of people being poisoned in their own homes every single night. how do you sleep at night @ClareDinnisEA ?  @EnvAgencyMids   @RedIndustries2  #sackclaredinnis https://t.co/ZoALNufxdr

This week I met with Sir James Bevan, CEO of the @EnvAgency, to discuss the national response to flooding & concerns over sewage in our rivers.  

I also raised the issue of local flooding in the Low Valley area & what support the EA can provide.
Contractors to @Merton_Council admit failures in management of Mitcham Bridge works caused pollution of Wandle - long term harm still being investigated by @EnvAgencySE https://t.co/T14gNcMfeb

A question was asked of me from the #StopTheStink  community how the off-site hydrogen sulphide levels compared to other landfill sites recently monitored by the EA. Here are the results from my FOI request. Walley‚Äôs Quarry Landfill is on the bottom row. https://t.co/qRXBVkXVc8

tweets.text: Bloody useless woman, the money you're paid you should be doing a better job! Think someone needs to go back and read their job description #sackclaredinnis #stopthestink @StinkStopthe #capitoff @BorisJohnson @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2

@EnvAgency you can expect to get mine too as soon as I can breathe well enough to talk. Oh did we mention we can't breath because of the toxic gases from the landfill?silly us it must have slipped our mind after all it's just a bit of an odour -NOT #StopTheStink https://t.co/zZDP9lpSgm

Can anyone who reads this sign this petition.If a landfill can be extended by the govt by overriding council decisions then offensive waste snuck on the permit in a town of 139,000 people it can happen to you-WE CANT BREATHE @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency @PHE_EoEngland @StinkStopthe https://t.co/hbjrjdje8c
@Bigdwazda @EnvAgencyMids @UKParliament Wow what a wonderful investment that would be .... he said sarcastically

Crime against humanity - someone must be held responsible, not only the source of the fumes but also the regulators - damn right this is negligence & they‚Äôre indirectly responsible for harm to health @EnvAgency @PHE_EoEngland @ClareDinnisEA #stopthestink @StinkStopthe #capitoff https://t.co/u2Jsa6srB4
